title: How to Earn Money and Trainer Points in Nintendogs

steps.title: Have at least 2 dogs to get loads of money.
steps.content: Have at least 2 dogs to get loads of money.

steps.title: Train them all in Disc Competitions and Agility Trial.
steps.content: Train them all in Disc Competitions and Agility Trial.

steps.title: Enter them three times a day with your dog.
steps.content: Enter them three times a day with your dog. You get $600 for winning the championship of Disc Competition. You get $1,000 for winning the Agility Trial championship. Also, you will get $2000 for the Obedience Trial Contest. Buy around 20 dogs, the basic home that costs $5000, earn trainer points and much more.

steps.title: Go on lots of walks each day.
steps.content: Go on lots of walks each day. This is the way to find presents as you interact with other dogs. You can take each dog on a walk more than once as long as you allow 30 minutes for the dog to rest before going on another walk.

steps.title: Walk one of your dogs.
steps.content: Walk one of your dogs. One the route that you take, try to get as many question marks covered as you can. If your dog gives you a Fireman's Hat, it unlocks a dalmatian. If your dog gives you a Jack Russel manual, it unlocks a Jack Russel. If you have these dogs, when they go on walks, they will get even rarer items if they uncover a gift.

steps.title: If you have unwanted duplicates (more than one) of any item, sell the extras at the Secondhand Shop for some money.
steps.content: If you have unwanted duplicates (more than one) of any item, sell the extras at the Secondhand Shop for some money.

steps.title: Get Trainer Points.
steps.content: Get Trainer Points. Start your Nintendog dogs' day by petting or brushing all of your dogs at your house until they sparkle. Feed all of them. Wash all of them. Enter three competitions each with all of your dogs and if you take first place, you will get around 100 Trainer Points. If you take second place, you get 75 Trainer Points. If you take third place, you get 50 Trainer Points. If you don't get into the rankings, you get 25 Trainer Points.

steps.title: Go on walks.
steps.content: Go on walks. You will get 50 trainer points each day.

steps.title: Get 50 Trainer Points if your dog meets another dog and they like each other.
steps.content: Get 50 Trainer Points if your dog meets another dog and they like each other.

steps.title: Get around 15 Trainer Points if you find a present.
steps.content: Get around 15 Trainer Points if you find a present.

steps.title: Get around 20 Trainer Points for visiting a friend in Bark Mode.
steps.content: Get around 20 Trainer Points for visiting a friend in Bark Mode. You can also trade items with your friend.

steps.title: Brush one of your dogs with a rubber/wire (whichever is necessary) brush and leave the brush on the dog when you go to sleep.
steps.content: Brush one of your dogs with a rubber/wire (whichever is necessary) brush and leave the brush on the dog when you go to sleep. Leave the charger in your DS. When you wake up in the morning, go to your game. You will have around 800 training points or maybe more than that.

steps.title: Don't over work your dog or else it will not like you!
steps.content: Don't over work your dog or else it will not like you!
